definitions.definition: division into parcels ; especially the dividing up of a large amount of land between the inhabitants of it so that each person receives an equal amount of land .

A map or annotation associating spatial locations (e.g., voxels) with parcel identities (e.g., anatomically or functionally circumscribed regions); the map or annotation that results from or delineates the results of parcellation (sense 1)

main_definition: division into parcels ; especially the dividing up of a large amount of land between the inhabitants of it so that each person receives an equal amount of land .
secondary_definitions: ( neuroscience , medical imaging ) A map or annotation associating spatial locations (e.g., voxels) with parcel identities (e.g., anatomically or functionally circumscribed regions); the map or annotation that results from or delineates the results of parcellation (sense 1)
